```{r include_packages, include = FALSE}
# This chunk ensures that the coppedown package is
# installed and loaded. This coppedown package includes
# the template files for the thesis.
if(!require(devtools))
  install.packages("devtools", repos = "http://cran.rstudio.com")
if(!require(coppedown))
  devtools::install_github("COPPE-UFRJ/coppedown")

# Set LaTeX tables styling
if(knitr::is_latex_output()){
  library(kableExtra)
  kable = function(data, caption = NULL){
    knitr::kable(x = data,
                 booktabs = TRUE,
                 digits = 3,
                 align = "c",
                 caption = caption,
                 format = "latex") %>% 
    kableExtra::kable_styling(latex_options = "HOLD_position") %>% 
    print()
  }
}else{
    library("magick")
    library("webshot")
    library(flextable)
    kable = function(data, caption = "NULL"){
      flextable::flextable(data) %>% 
        flextable::set_caption(caption) %>% 
        colformat_double(digits = 2) %>% 
        plot(zoom = 2, expand = 10)
    }
}

# Set Global Chunk Options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    fig.align = "center",
    echo = FALSE, 
    message = FALSE,
    warning = FALSE
    )
```
